entry.title: Monday: Light snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Light snow and local blowing snow ending this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this morning then becoming light this afternoon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. Temperature falling to minus 21 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 21 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 32 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 20 February 2023
